TextView.android:text:
This app demonstrate BroadCast receiver. 

 1.Dynamic receiver. To shutdown the network and focus on the toast message which is according to the CONNECTIVITY_CHANGE broadcast 

 2. Static receiver. to restart System and this app will run automatically according to BOOT_COMPLETED broadcast. 

 3. Regist receiver statically to receive customer broadcast MY_BROADCAST that sended by DemoBroadcast app. It is forbiden upon android 8.0

 4. Registe receiver dynamically to receiver customer broadcast MY_BROADCAST that sended by DemoBroadcast APP.
